Description: Incomplete sample template for testing parsing of various parameters

KeyName.Description: Name of an existing EC2 KeyPair to enable SSH access to the instances
KeyName.ConstraintDescription: must be the name of an existing EC2 KeyPair.

WebServerInstanceType.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid EC2 instance type.

SecondaryIPAddressCount.Description: Number of secondary IP addresses to assign to the network interface (1-5)
SecondaryIPAddressCount.ConstraintDescription: must be a number from 1 to 5.

MasterUserPassword.Description: The password associated with the aster user account for the redshift cluster that is being created.

Subnets.Description: The list of SubnetIds in your Virtual Private Cloud (VPC)
Subnets.ConstraintDescription: must be a list of an existing subnets in the selected Virtual Private Cloud.

AZs.Description: The list of AvailabilityZones for your Virtual Private Cloud (VPC)
AZs.ConstraintDescription: must be a list if valid EC2 availability zones for the selected Virtual Private Cloud
